column2: called Parma Kuluina by the Eldar
column3: was a book about the history of the Elder Days
column4: kept by the Elves of Tol Eressëa in their city of Kortirion. Pengolodh consulted the Golden Book when compiling the Quenta Silmarillion. Eriol/Ælfwine was allowed to read the Parma Kuluina.

column1: Parma Kuluina is Quenya for "the Golden Book"
column2: consisting of parma "book" + kuluina ("golden" or "of gold").

column1: Its earlier Qenya name was rendered Parma Kuluinen.
